scripts.camunda:clean: rm -rf camunda/data && docker compose -f camunda/operate/docker-compose.yml stop elasticsearch
scripts.spec:update: cd camunda && git reset --hard && git clean -fd && git pull && cd .. && cp camunda/zeebe/gateway-protocol/src/main/proto/rest-api.yaml rest-api.yaml
scripts.docs:generate: npm run docs:copy:patches && npm run docs:copy:spec && npm run --prefix camunda-docs api:generate:camunda
scripts.docs:push: cd camunda-docs && git add . && git commit -m"updated docs" && git fetch origin && git rebase origin/main -X ours && git push --force-with-lease
scripts.spec:go: npm run spec:generate && npm run lint && npm run spec:install && npm run spec:build && npm run spec:verify
scripts.spec:generate: cd java/openapi-camunda-key-flattener && mvn clean compile exec:java
scripts.lint: npm run lint:domain && npm run lint:generated
scripts.sdks:generate: npm run sdks:install && npm run sdks:clean && cd sdks/tools && npx ts-node ./generate-all-sdks.ts
scripts.sdks:list: ls -la sdks/generated | grep '^d' || echo 'No SDKs generated yet'
scripts.build:sdks: npm run sdks:install && npm run sdks:generate
scripts.postbuild:sdks: echo 'âœ… SDKs generated in ./sdks/generated' && npm run sdks:list
scripts.test:sdks: npm run sdks:install && cd sdks/tools && npm run test
scripts.testsuite:generate: cd api-test/semantic-graph-extractor && npm run extract-graph && cd ../path-analyser && npm run build && node dist/src/index.js && npm run codegen:playwright:all
scripts.validate: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "SERVER,DOCS,SDK" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,magenta.bold" "npm run spec:go" "npm run docs:generate" "npm run sdks:generate"
